fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Flame-Forged Insight__
A 4-star Event Weapon that satisfies all of Aino's requirements.

__Master Key__
Nod-Krai craftable weapon that will work for most of her teams.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Favonius Greatsword__
If your team has very high energy requirements, it is a viable option.

__Forest Regalia__
Another craftable option that works only in Nilou's teams.

__Makhaira Aquamarine, Mailed Flower, Rainslasher__
Alternatives that have somewhat useful passives or substats.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Elemental Mastery|<goblet> Elemental Mastery|<circlet> Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Precision Hydronic Cooler
**2)** Elemental Skill: Musecatcher
**N/A)** Normal Attack: Bish-Bash-Bosh Repair

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
In Bloom and Lunar-Bloom teams, __Deepwood Memories__ is a great option. 

If another teammate is already using the supportive sets, going for __Gilded Dreams__ or __Emblem of Severed Fate__ is also viable.

Energy requirements are around 150-180%, Elemental Mastery requirements are between 400 and 800, depending greatly on Aino's teams, artifacts and weapon.
